column2: Tester has the valid login details for Gists (One can use Github account) and a valid authentication token available

Test scope includes the scenarios:
- Create a Gist
- Read Gist Information
- Update a gist
- Delete a Gist
- List gist commits

The main objectives of this testing process include:
- Smoke Testing
- Functionality
- Performance: Load and Stress testing
- Security Testing
